name: 斯里拉姆·雷迪
name_full: 斯里拉姆·雷迪 Sriram Reddy Polasane
introduction: A Software Engineer and an IT Trainer who turned into a Commercial Model, Film, and Theatre artist. Acted in Multi-lingual (PAN INDIA) Movies, Web series, AD shoots, and Theatre plays since 2019.Seamlessly Worked in MNC's on different domains since 2007. Trained more than 20k students across the globe on software, and management as well as on acting and modeling.Pursed PG in Masters of Computer Applications (MCA). Undergone Film and Theatre workshops and participated in plays from multiple theatre groups.Sriram Reddy Polasane, Nick Name (Guru) born to Prabhakar Reddy, Sucharitha Reddy from Warangal, Telangana State in 1980 on 22 DEC.A sports enthusiast who is good at Horseback riding, Inline skating, Underwater swimming, Yoga, BMX, etc...
